content: धर्षित {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [धृष्-कर्मणि क्त-इट् गुणश्च] {@--1@} Seduced, outraged, violated. {@--2@} Overpowered, overcome, defeated; <ls>N. 22. 155.</ls> {@--3@} Ill-treated abused, insulted. --तं {@--1@} Contumely, pride. {@--2@} Cohabitation, copulation. {@--3@} Impatience, intolerance. --ता A harlot, a disloyal or unchaste woman.
